UNKNOWN_INTENT: Sorry, I didn't get that. Try saying {Suggestion}.
BET_PLACED_REPROMPT: Place another bet or say spin the wheel to spin.
BET_INVALID_NOBANKROLL: Sorry, you don't have enough money to place more bets. Say spin to spin the wheel.
BET_INVALID_AMOUNT: I'm sorry, {BetAmount} is not a valid amount to bet. What else can I help you with?
BET_INVALID_REPROMPT: What else can I help you with?
BETCOLUMN_INVALID_COLUMN: Sorry, you must specify the first, second, or third column. What else can I help you with?
BETCOLUMN_INVALID_COLUMN_VALUE: Sorry, {Ordinal} is not a valid column. What else can I help you with?
BETDOZEN_INVALID_DOZEN: Sorry, you must specify the first, second, or third dozen. What else can I help you with?

HELP_JOIN_TOURNAMENT: The weekly tournament is a chance for you to play against other players to try to get the highest bankroll in 100 spins. Say yes to join the tournament or no to play the normal game.
HELP_JOIN_TOURNAMENT_REPROMPT: Say yes to join the tournament or no to play the normal game.
HELP_CARD_TEXT:
You can place outside or inside bets on a roulette wheel, and can place {Range} on each bet. Say READ HIGH SCORES to hear the leader board.
The game is played with a wheel containing 18 black numbers, 18 red numbers, and either one or two zeroes (a zero and a double zero)
OUTSIDE BETS:
The following bets pay even money: Red numbers, Black numbers, Even numbers (which exclude zeroes), Odd numbers, Low numbers (1-18), or High numbers (19-36).
You can also bet on dozens of numbers ("first dozen" 1-12, "second dozen" 13-24, "third dozen" 25-36) or columns of numbers ("first column" 1,4,7, etc) which pay 2 to 1.
INSIDE BETS:You can place a bet on an individual number, including zero or double zero, which will pay 35 to 1. Or you can bet on groups of adjacent numbers such as 1 and 2; or 5, 6, 8, and 9. You can also place bets on a row or double row by calling out three or six numbers, such as "bet on 7, 8, and 9." Betting on two numbers pays 17 to 1, three numbers 11 to 1, four numbers 8 to 1, and six numbers 5 to 1.
If you wish to change between a single zero and double zero wheel, you can say "Change the wheel to an American wheel" or "Change the wheel to a European wheel." An American wheel has two zeroes, while a European wheel cuts the house advantage in half by only having a single wheel. Your high score and ranking are maintained separately between these two types of wheels.
You earn achievement points as you play which is how the high score board is determined. You earn points as follows:
 - 100 achievement points each time you win the Thursday Tournament
 - 10 points each day you play
 - an exponential 2 to the N points for each streak of the same number coming up N times in a row.

SPIN_ONEBET_WINNER.v1: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> You won leaving you with ${Bankroll} {SpinsRemaining, plural, =0 {} =1 {and one spin} other {and # spins}} <break time="200ms"/> {Achievements} Would you like to spin again?

SPIN_PUSH.v1: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time="399ms"/> You won your {NumberOfWinners, plural, =1 {bet} other {bets}}  on {WinBet} but broke even overall <break time="200ms"/> {Achievements} {SpinsRemaining, plural, =0 {} =1 {You have one spin left.} other {You have # spins to go.}} Would you like to spin again?
SPIN_PUSH.v2: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> It's {Result} <break time="399ms"/> The good news is you won your {NumberOfWinners, plural, =1 {bet} other {bets}}  on {WinBet} but lost your other {NumberOfLosers, plural, =1 {bet} other {bets}} so it's a wash <break time="200ms"/> {Achievements} {SpinsRemaining, plural, =0 {} =1 {You have one spin to go.} other {You have # spins left.}} Spin again?
SPIN_PUSH.v3: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> Looks like we have {Result} as the winner <break time="399ms"/> Well <break time="300ms"/> you won your {NumberOfWinners, plural, =1 {bet} other {bets}}  on {WinBet} <break time="300ms"/> but broken even overall and wind up with the same bankroll as before {SpinsRemaining, plural, =0 {} =1 {but now only one more spin} other {but one less spin remaining}} <break time="200ms"/> {Achievements} Care to spin again?

TOURNAMENT_WELCOME_BACK.v2: <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/casinowelcome.mp3"/> Thanks for coming back to the tournament! You have {Spins} spins left. Place your bets or say spin to spin the wheel.

TOURNAMENT_WELCOME_NEWPLAYER.v1: Welcome to the Roulette Tournament! You start the tournament with ${Amount} and have {Spins} spins to earn as high a bankroll as possible. <break time='300ms'/> The winner will receive 100 achievement points. Place a bet to get started.

TOURNAMENT_BANKRUPT: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time='399ms'/> {Achievements} You lost all your money and are out of the tournament. Check back tomorrow for the results.
TOURNAMENT_OUTOFSPINS: No more bets! <audio src="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/alexasoundclips/spinwheel.mp3" /> The ball landed on {Result} <break time='399ms'/> {Achievements} That was your last spin. Thanks for playing! Check back tomorrow for the results.
TOURNAMENT_HELP_WITHBETS: You are playing in the Roulette Wheel tournament. You have ${Bankroll} and {Spins} spins remaining. {Standing}. Say spin the wheel to play your bets or read high scores to hear the leader board. Check the Alexa companion app for a full set of additional bets you can place. What else can I help you with?
TOURNAMENT_HELP_LASTBETS: You are playing in the Roulette Wheel tournament. You have ${Bankroll} and {Spins} spins remaining. {Standing}. Say spin the wheel to play the same bets from last time or read high scores to hear the leader board. Check the Alexa companion app for a full set of new bets you can place. What else can I help you with?
TOURNAMENT_HELP_REPROMPT: What else can I help you with?
TOURNAMENT_HELP_CARD_TEXT:
You are playing in the Roulette Wheel tournament. You can spin up to {Spins} times on a double zero wheel. Whoever has the highest bankroll at the end of the tournament wins 100 achievement points.
Say READ HIGH SCORES to hear the current leader board. You can place outside or inside bets on a roulette wheel, and can place {Range} on each bet. The game is played with a wheel containing 18 black numbers, 18 red numbers, and two zeroes
OUTSIDE BETS:
The following bets pay even money: Red numbers, Black numbers, Even numbers (which exclude zeroes), Odd numbers, Low numbers (1-18), or High numbers (19-36).
You can also bet on dozens of numbers ("first dozen" 1-12, "second dozen" 13-24, "third dozen" 25-36) or columns of numbers ("first column" 1,4,7, etc) which pay 2 to 1.
INSIDE BETS:You can place a bet on an individual number, including zero or double zero, which will pay 35 to 1. Or you can bet on groups of adjacent numbers such as 1 and 2; or 5, 6, 8, and 9. You can also place bets on a row or double row by calling out three or six numbers, such as "bet on 7, 8, and 9." Betting on two numbers pays 17 to 1, three numbers 11 to 1, four numbers 8 to 1, and six numbers 5 to 1.
SPIN_CANTBET_LASTBETS: Sorry, your bankroll of ${Bankroll} can't support your last set of bets.
TOURNAMENT_WINNER: Congratulations, you won the tournament with ${Amount}!
TOURNAMENT_LOSER: Sorry, you didn't win the tournament. The high score was ${HighScore} and you had ${Amount}.
EXIT_REMINDER: {RemainingTime} <break time="200ms"/> Would you like me to set a weekly reminder for the tournament?
EXIT_REMINDER_REPROMPT: Would you like me to set a weekly reminder for the tournament?
REMINDER_TEXT: The Roulette Wheel tournament is starting now.
REMINDER_GRANT_PERMISSION: Please grant this skill permission in the Alexa companion app to set reminders and try again.
REMINDER_ERROR: Sorry, there was a problem setting your reminder. Please try again.
REMINDER_SET: Great. I set a reminder for the tournament round every {Time} {Timezone} <break time="200ms"/> See you then!
